name: Cibele
summary: Cibele is a game about love, sex, and the internet. You play as a 19 year old girl who has become close with a young man she met in an online game. Her relationship with him heats up, becoming more and more intimate with each phone call and private chat.
info:
• 中文名: 希蓓蕾
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: AVG
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2015年11月3日
  • 售价: ¥ 34
  • 官方网站: http://ninasays.so/cibele/
